cause.description: For every copy of the Gary Bloom album "Lighting the Dark" sold online by September 1st, $2 will be donated to cancer research. There are hopes that, when a second Gary Bloom album is released, the same offer will be made. I am also hoping that other independent musicians will join the cause, so that together, we can try and make a difference. "Lighting the Dark" can be purchased at http://cdbaby.com/cd/garybloom for $9USD 1. It is our responsibility - not a governments - to support cancer research 2. one-time large scale concerts are nice, but let's try something ongoing
cause.name: Music Fighting Cancer
